newsitem.title: UK: Enterprise to develop Italian oil find-paper.
newsitem.headline: Enterprise to develop Italian oil find-paper.

text.p: LONDON, Feb 17 (REUTER) - Britain's Enterprise Oil Plc is planning to proceed soon with a full-scale development of its Italian oilfield with the aid of computer models, according to a report in the Financial Times on Monday.
The newspaper said the technical breakthrough will help the company reduce the risk of wells running dry and the computer model will also cut drilling costs for the company.

The discovery in the southern Apennines of Italy is thought to be one of Western Europe's largest oil finds but uncertainty has surrounded the project because of the area's difficult geology, the paper said.
Enterprise is partnered in the project by Agip of Italy and Britain's Lasmo.
